name: B. Eugeny and Play List
statement:
Eugeny loves listening to music. He has songs in his play list. We know
that song number has the duration of minutes. Eugeny listens to each
song, perhaps more than once. He listens to song number times. Eugenyâ€™s
play list is organized as follows: first song number plays times, then
song number plays times, , in the end the song number plays times.Eugeny
took a piece of paper and wrote out moments of time when he liked a
song. Now for each such moment he wants to know the number of the song
that played at that moment. The moment means that Eugeny wants to know
which song was playing during the -th minute of his listening to the
play list.Help Eugeny and calculate the required numbers of songs.
editorial: For each song we will count moment of time, when it will be over (some sums on the prefixes, for example). Further, we will use binary search of two itaratos method to solve the problem.
